title: AskCPG (Clinical Practice Guidelines AI)
description: An AI-powered assistant for Malaysian Clinical Practice Guidelines (CPG), similar to ChatGPT but specialized for medical contexts. Supports both text and image inputs to provide accurate clinical guidance.

title: DrMata (Diabetic Retinopathy AI)
description: A collaboration with the Ministry of Health Malaysia (KKM). An integrated web application connecting gateway devices with fundus cameras, powered by AI to detect diabetic retinopathy from retinal scans in real-time.

title: NoraKPJ (Triage Assistant)
description: A dedicated triage web application assisting medical staff in streamlining patient workflow. Originally a standalone app, now fully integrated into the KPJ Healthcare ecosystem.

title: QmedScribe (Medical Scribing)
description: A subscription-based medical scribing solution for Malaysia. Facilitates documentation for triage, emergency departments, and general consultations between doctors and patients.

title: Atlas Legacy CMS
description: A comprehensive Content Management System for VAS business landing pages. Features include S3 bucket management, DynamoDB data retrieval, and real-time dashboard statistics.

title: UiTM Events Portal
description: A budget-optimized event portal for UiTM, built with static technologies for high performance and zero server maintenance costs.
